author: Milton Glaser
quote: There are three responses to a piece of design – yes, no, and WOW! Wow is the one to aim for.

author: Paul Rand
quote: The public is more familiar with bad design than good design. It is, in effect, conditioned to prefer bad design, because that is what it lives with. The new becomes threatening, the old reassuring.

author: Stefan Sagmeister
quote: You can have an art experience in front of a Rembrandt… or in front of a piece of graphic design.

author: David Carson
quote: Graphic design will save the world right after rock and roll does.

author: Bob Gill
quote: I’ve never had a problem with a dumb client. There is no such thing as a bad client. Part of our job is to do good work and get the client to accept it.

author: Paula Scher
quote: It’s through mistakes that you actually can grow. You have to get bad in order to get good.

author: Michael Bierut
quote: If you do good work for good clients, it will lead to other good work for other good clients. If you do bad work for bad clients, it will lead to other bad work for other bad clients.

author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
quote: A designer knows he has achieved perfection not when there is nothing left to add, but when there is nothing left to take away.

author: Marian Bantjes
quote: But I find that for myself, without exception, the more I deal with the work as something that is my own, as something that is personal, the more successful it is.

author: Neville Brody
quote: Digital design is like painting, except the paint never dries.

author: Joshua Brewer
quote: Socrates said, “Know thyself.” I say, “Know thy users.” And guess what? They don’t think like you do.

author: Saul Bass
quote: I want to make beautiful things, even if nobody cares, as opposed to ugly things. That’s my intent.

author: Frank Chimero
quote: Good design is all about making other designers feel like idiots because that idea wasn’t theirs.

author: Lindon Leader
quote: I strive for two things in design: simplicity and clarity. Great design is born of those two things.

author: Jeffrey Zeldman
quote: Content precedes design. Design in the absence of content is not design, it’s decoration.

author: Massimo Vignelli
quote: The life of a designer is a life of fight. Fight against the ugliness. Just like a doctor fights against disease. For us, the visual disease is what we have around, and what we try to do is cure it somehow with design.

author: Irene Au
quote: Good design is like a refrigerator—when it works, no one notices, but when it doesn’t, it sure stinks.

author: Grace Hopper
quote: It’s easier to ask forgiveness than it is to get permission.

author: Dieter Rams
quote: Good design is honest.

author: John Maeda
quote: Design is a solution to a problem. Art is a question to a problem.

author: M.C. Escher
quote: Only those who attempt the absurd will achieve the impossible.

author: Edward Tufte
quote: Design isn’t crafting a beautiful textured button with breathtaking animation. It’s figuring out if there’s a way to get rid of the button altogether.

author: Jessica Hische
quote: The work you do while you procrastinate is probably the work you should be doing for the rest of your life.

author: Gerhard Steidl
quote: Fuck the midtones

author: Hans Aarsman
quote: Thinking is hard. Not thinking is harder

author: Erik Kessels
quote: Perfect is the enemy of the good. Free yourself from the tyranny of perfection! Never surrender!

author: Stefan Mumaw
quote: Live in the leading—the spaces in between the rules.

author: Salvador Dali
quote: Have no fear of perfection—you’ll never reach it.

author: Irene Au
quote: Good design is like a refrigerator—when it works, no one notices, but when it doesn’t, it sure stinks."

author: Steve Jobs
quote: Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works.

author: Ray Kroc
quote: Creativity is a highfalutin word for the work I have to do between now and Tuesday.

author: Marshal McLuhan
quote: Art is anything you can get away with

author: Paula Scher
quote: It’s through mistakes that you actually can grow. You have to get bad in order to get good

author: Christoph Niemann
quote: Get rid of everything that is not essential to making a point.

author: Charles Eames
quote: The role of the designer is that of a good, thoughtful host anticipating the needs of his guests.

author: Paul Rand
quote: Design can be art. Design can be simple. That’s why it’s so complicated.

author: Frank Chimero
quote: People ignore designs that ignore people

author: Drory Ben-Menachem
quote: You don’t have to be ‘a creative’ to be creative

author: Douglas Adams
quote: I love deadlines. I like the whooshing sound they make as they fly by.

author: H. L. Mencken
quote: For every complex problem, there is an answer that is clear, simple, and wrong.

author: Saul Bass
quote: Design is thinking made visual

author: Charles Eames
quote: How well we communicate is determined not by how well we say things, but how well we are understood.

author: Joe Sparano
quote: Good design is obvious. Great design is transparent.

author: Nicholas Negroponte
quote: Where do new ideas come from? The answer is simple: differences. Creativity comes from unlikely juxtapositions.

author: Paul Arden
quote: Do not seek praise. Seek criticism.

author: Massimo Vignelli
quote: Styles come and go. Good design is a language, not a style.

author: George Nelson
quote: You don’t think your way to creative work. You work your way to creative thinking.

author: Henry Ford
quote: If I had asked people what they wanted, they would have said faster horses

author: Henry Ford
quote: Design is a solution to a problem. Art is a question to a problem.

author: Massimo Vignelli
quote: There is no design without discipline. There is no discipline without intelligence.

author: John Chris Jones
quote: Design everything on the assumption that people are not heartless or stupid but marvelously capable.

author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery
quote: Perfection is achieved not when there is nothing more to add, but when there is nothing left to take away

author: Irene Etzkorn
quote: There is no such thing as a boring project. There are only boring executions.

author: William Edmund Hick
quote: The time it takes to make a decision increases as the number of alternatives increases.

author: Steve Jobs
quote: Sometimes when you innovate, you make mistakes.

author: Paul Rand
quote: Simplicity is not the goal. It is the by-product of a good idea and modest expectations.

author: Michael Beruit
quote: Simplicity, wit and good typography

author: Petrula Vrontikis
quote: Practice safe design: Use a concept
